projects: [{"title":"Smart detection from CCTV video shots","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Mar 2021","description":"it's main focus is towards highlighting the efficient use of the imaging devices by providing real time solutions such as: Vehicle detection, Number plate detection,Vehicle attributes extraction-color, Speed calculation and crash detection.Tech Involved: OpenCV, python, Numpy, tensorflow, MySQL, HTML,CSS, Javascrip"},{"title":"Artificial Intelligence Virtual Lab (Initiative by MHRD)","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"The project focuses to provide remote-access to Laboratories in various areas of science and engineering.AI virtual lab is under the Department of Computer Science and Engineering.it provides an interactional environment for conducting simulated experiments.The goal is to equip students/teachers with necessary skills and knowledge,so as to eliminate shortage of trained manpower in sci.&tech.."}]
